When you're honored you'll find that the loot, such as keys and chests, drop at random! The Hextech Loot is free to begin with and no one's forcing you to buy the keys, or chests. You get an S on a Champion you haven't got one on before and you'll get a Chest. You stay friendly and honorable towards your team you get a chance for a key, and for you even a loot chest. You're already winning, now you just have to be patient when it comes to that loot. You login and sometimes you'll find it pop up for you being honorable.

I'm spooked about key fragments. Can you give me all the changes?

Sure can. First, they drop through Honor now. The idea here is to give them a proper home, rather than just having them drop through arcane calculations at the end of your games.

Get all your key fragments by doing two simple things: Playing games, and avoiding Instant Feedback penalties like chat restrictions and bans. That's it. It's an intentionally low bar, because we want you to get your stuff. You donâ€™t need to be honored by teammates to get keys. Individual honors are connected to other rewards like loading screen flairs. Keys can drop whether you win or drop the game. Key fragments no longer drop at end of game screen. They'll hit while browsing the client or on login.
